original_text:
The captain of the guard assigned them to Joseph, and he attended them.
After they had been in custody for some time,
korean_text: 친위대장이 요셉에게 그들을 수종들게 하매 요셉이 그들을 섬겼더라 그들이 갇힌 지 여러 날이라

sentences.original_text: The captain of the guard assigned them to Joseph
After they had been in custody for some time
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 얼마 동안 감옥에 있은 후에
